topic: Deep dive: traceback standard library module in Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: Deep dive: traceback standard library module in Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Deep Dive: Traceback Standard Library Module in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: An in-depth exploration of the enhancements and features of the traceback module in Python 3.12+, providing improved exception handling capabilities.
key_points: New format specifiers for traceback objects
Support for filtering tracebacks by frame class or module
Improved performance through caching of filtered tracebacks
version_notes: Previously known issues with tracebacks containing cyclic frames have been addressed
caveats: The new format specifiers may not be backward-compatible with earlier versions of Python.
Enhanced filtering features might not work as expected if the code is running inside a custom frame class or within some special contexts like Jupyter notebooks.
